name: E-Ride Falcon X1
description: The Falcon X1 is built for speed and agility, with a powerful 5000W motor and a sleek carbon fiber body.

name: E-Ride Cruiser 500
description: A perfect blend of comfort and performance, the Cruiser 500 is ideal for long city commutes with its 120km range.

name: E-Ride Thunderbolt Pro
description: Equipped with dual suspension and advanced traction control, Thunderbolt Pro handles all terrains effortlessly.

name: E-Ride Comet RS
description: Compact and lightweight, the Comet RS is perfect for zipping through traffic with its responsive controls.

name: E-Ride Titan Max
description: An all-terrain beast, Titan Max offers unmatched durability, 150km range, and a regenerative braking system.

name: E-Ride Shadow Z
description: Shadow Z combines stealth design with an ultra-quiet motor and night-vision dashboard.

name: E-Ride Ranger V2
description: With a rugged frame and high clearance, Ranger V2 is ready for off-road adventures.

name: E-Ride Phantom Core
description: Sleek and stylish, Phantom Core offers high speed and a smooth riding experience.

name: E-Ride Nova R1
description: The Nova R1 features intelligent AI driving assist and anti-theft GPS tracking.

name: E-Ride Eclipse Neo
description: A futuristic design with smart LED lighting and advanced connectivity features.

name: E-Ride Blaze GT
description: Blaze GT reaches 0-60km/h in just 3.5 seconds, with ultra-fast charging support.

name: E-Ride EcoLite
description: A compact and affordable e-ride built for urban travel with a 60km range.

name: E-Ride Striker Alpha
description: Striker Alpha features smart voice controls and gesture-based navigation.

name: E-Ride Pulse Mini
description: Designed for teens and students, Pulse Mini is lightweight and safe.

name: E-Ride Apex Cruiser
description: A premium city cruiser with leather seating and Bluetooth audio system.

name: E-Ride Vortex 9
description: A sports-oriented e-ride with racing-grade suspension and brakes.

name: E-Ride Aero Edge
description: Aerodynamically enhanced body for high-speed efficiency and reduced drag.

name: E-Ride Stealth Mode
description: Designed for covert operations, Stealth Mode is silent, fast, and nearly invisible at night.

name: E-Ride Horizon TRX
description: Long-range touring made easy with Horizon TRX, featuring built-in solar charging panels.

name: E-Ride Rapid-X
description: Rapid-X is built for thrill-seekers, reaching top speeds of 120km/h with minimal vibration.

name: E-Ride Orbit Glide
description: Orbit Glide offers cloud-like suspension and noise-free cruising, perfect for city gliders.

name: E-Ride Zenith Evo
description: The Zenith Evo leads the pack with AI-adaptive speed, self-balancing tech, and luxury design.
